title: i cant start my league of legends
body: i have a problem wich is that as soon as i open league the icon in the middle appears but then shortly afterwards it dissapears and it chrases i need help as soon as possible thanks

replies.body: It sounds like your OS might be blocking League from running. Double check that your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) are still up to date, and let me know if that doesn't help.
